name: Knight Light
description:
Knight Light is a local 4 player arena combat game with top down visuals and a focus on stealth and analog combat. Choose from 5 unique weapons to slay your competition. Use the darkness to disguise your movements and outwit your opponents. It's kill or be killed! Will you be the last knight standing, or haunt the battlefield as a ghost FOREVER!!! until the next round?

CONTROLLER REQUIRED

The game is currently under development!

Contact us at Tim.chu90@gmail.com or @timatron99 for suggestions/support.

Features

  • 5 Unique Weapons
    • Flail - SMASH!
    • Sword - SLASH!
    • Bow - SHOOT!
    • Lance - poke.
    • Bomb - BOMB?
  • Analog Combat! No canned animations. Swing hard to destroy your opponents or tickle them for funsies. All damage is based on how well you control your weapon.
  • HIDE in the darkness to outmaneuver your opponents. Escape into the darkness and reappear to heal or sneak attack your unwary foes.
  • 4 Arenas to test your might!
  • Not a roguelike!

Team

Tim Chu, Michael Feffer, Delio Gautreaux, Matt Talubas

Music from Kevin Macleod (incompetech.com)
